channel.title: Error when running server
channel.description:
[code] runserver: [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadSection(WorldLoader.java:113) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadWorld(WorldLoader.java:37) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:95) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:31) [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] ---- Debugging information ---- [java] message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] line number : 3 [java] path : /linked-list-array/linked-list/InvItem [java] cause-message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] class : [Ljava.util.LinkedList; [java] cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException [java] required-type : org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem [java] ------------------------------- [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:45) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:60) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:53) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter.unmarshal(ArrayConverter.java:51) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:99) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.java:12) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:552) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:540) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.PersistenceManager.load(PersistenceManager.java:41) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.EntityHandler.<clinit>(EntityHandler.java:346) [java] ... 4 more [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflectionProvider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:50) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.instantiateNewInstance(ReflectionConverter.java:148) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.unmarshal(ReflectionConverter.java:90) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] ... 21 more [java] Exception in thread "main"
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 2 seconds [/code] Any idea why this would happen? Obviously something is wrong with a certain file. It compiles the server okay, just won't start.

item.title: Error when running server
item.dc:creator: @Kurisu Kurisu
item.description:
@Kurisu wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:2, topic:445679”]dog your xmls are all over the place

you need to recruit worldwide pro xmler Dan Rein (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=214820)[/quote]

Care to elaborate? Or have I forgotten where I posted this? …

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running server
item.dc:creator: @Kurisu Kurisu
item.description:
@Kurisu wrote:

runserver:
     [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadSection(WorldLoader.java:113)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadWorld(WorldLoader.java:37)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:95)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:31)
     [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor
     [java] ---- Debugging information ----
     [java] message             : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor 
     [java] line number         : 3 
     [java] path                : /linked-list-array/linked-list/InvItem 
     [java] cause-message       : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor 
     [java] class               : [Ljava.util.LinkedList; 
     [java] cause-exception     : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException 
     [java] required-type       : org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem 
     [java] -------------------------------
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:45)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:60)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:53)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter.unmarshal(ArrayConverter.java:51)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.convertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:99)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.java:12)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:552)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:540)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.util.PersistenceManager.load(PersistenceManager.java:41)
     [java] 	at org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.EntityHandler.<clinit>(EntityHandler.java:346)
     [java] 	... 4 more
     [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAccessException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflectionProvider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:50)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.instantiateNewInstance(ReflectionConverter.java:148)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter.unmarshal(ReflectionConverter.java:90)
     [java] 	at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:38)
     [java] 	... 21 more
     [java] Exception in thread "main" 

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 2 seconds

Any idea why this would happen? Obviously something is wrong with a certain file. It compiles the server okay, just won’t start.

Read full topic
